TopicTitle: Any interest in a Megapack of textures for Procedural Parts?

Articles.Content:
I've put together most all the textures I was able to find for Procedural Parts, for my own use.  I wondered if anyone would be interested in this as a small mod add on. 

Edited November 6, 2016 by Padrone
Added images

Hi just a heads up,  something like this was tried quite recently with flags, and due to individual creators not wanting their textures however small distributed by someone else the idea was rapidly reconsidered and scrapped. It is not unusual for textures and models to be ARR while cfgs code etc are under a much more forgiving license.  so you may just be lining yourself up for a lot of grief.
Let's see what these textures are first.

Spanner has the gist of it. Anything that rebundles other mods into "mod packs" generally comes to ruin, for licensing at the very least. What you could do is put together a master post of procedural parts or a CKAN download thing (I have no idea how that works though) so it'll download everything for someone with one click. But redistributing them all yourself will probably get you in hot water.

@SpannerMonkey(smce) & @Deimos Rast, I had reviewed the pertinent license texts from the websites, and looked up the actual summaries on the Creative Commons site.

I don't think any of them prevent a redistribution of the textures themselves.  (I did the MM patches myself so that's not an issue.) 

However, I'm new to using copyright licenses.  Do you see a problem with any of these preventing a redistribution with attributions?

  • CC-BY-NC 4.0
  • CC-BY-NC-SA-4.0
  • Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License
  • Creative Commons -- Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0
  • Creative Commons CC BY-NC-ND 3.0 license

I'm also going to PM the folks involved to see if I can get explicit permission(s).

@SpannerMonkey(smce), Yeah, I saw that issue with the flags pack a bit ago.  It's a pity they didn't leave out any they weren't sure of.  There was some cool stuff in there.
